reviewText: Great balance of comedy and fighting

Saw this film on a United Airlines flight to Honolulu, just as an impulse to avoid the usual American films. What a treat! Silly slapstick, with delightfully absurd translation subtitling. Crouching Tiger meets the Keystone Kops. I'm not particularly enamored of Kung Fu movies, but this one was a real knee-slapper. What a shame Amazon doesn't have a Region 1 DVD for us here in the states, if there is even one available. I'd buy it in a heartbeat. Classic Chinese cinema? Who cares- it's great entertainment!
